title: Blocky yet rounded display looking font.
content:
Could someone please help me identify this font?  
I tried researching myself but I am far from being a font expert, hence me turning to those who are.  
Thank you very much for your time in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020173050im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_5333.jpg)
author: Timi Desu

comments.content: Very close (if not exact) to **[Action Force](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020173050/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Action%20Force%20-%20Normal&fid=34413374bafb915d2717cabcd40779b0&fsize=48&text=PLUS%20EXTRA%20GEWINNCHANCE!&wrap=2)** aka **Hauser** by Neale Davidson (2000, Free for personal use)
